attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: I opened the app and my phone shut of and when I turned my phone back on all my apps where deleted and my Apple ID was deleted

attributes.title: Trump Ninja’s
attributes.review: When I downloaded tuu hi is app it asked for my address the next day I have TRUMP NINJA’S at my house and they said “if no give trump 5 star, bye to grandma!” And then they chucked her out of my 6 story house window! 😱I couldn’t believe what I saw, worst app ever! R.I.P grandma.. 😞

attributes.title: Horrible don’t get
attributes.review: This app destroyed my phone, my phone is glitching is bad and I can’t open any apps. It all started one I opened this awful app. Seriously please don’t get this app

attributes.title: Couldn’t even use it
attributes.review: Every time I opened the app it just automatically crashed. I don’t know why but it’s not even worth downloading.

attributes.title: Hell no
attributes.review: All this app is filled with is glitches and spamming you with text messages. I cannot believe they allow this app to run. I think I’ve been hacked... thanks to trump.

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: When I opened the app it gave me a notification saying that I can’t have access to it because I’m “of color” and “I didn’t surpass the requirements of a true white male”

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: This app speaks for itself. It is absolutely terrible and full of malfunctions. Not to mention, it supports a man who promotes hatred and doesn’t do his job. Additionally, the app almost caused my death. I opened it and immediately fainted from pure DISGUST. NEVER EVER DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: 🟠mad cuz mad🟠
attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars, I would. After I downloaded this app, my phone started acting up. It started showing me proof and evidence on how our 🟠 president is a racist and rapist! Shiver me timbers! It was so spooky

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: Nothing on this app works! Complete garbage! Heard it was for the campaign of a total bigot! The app does not do its job and neither does the man it promotes! Super glitchy, grammatical errors everywhere. would. not. recommend.

attributes.title: This app is awful
attributes.review: After 5 minutes of having this app all of my information was leaked and the person this app was made by raped 3 people
